alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 7:39PM CST until February 26 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Des Arc affecting Prairie County. White River At Georgetown affecting Woodruff, White and Prairie Counties. White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. White River At Clarendon affecting Arkansas and Monroe Counties. Ouachita River At Camden affecting Ouachita and Calhoun Counties. Ouachita River At Thatcher L&D affecting Bradley, Union and Calhoun Counties. Cache River Near Patterson affecting Jackson and Woodruff Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Arkansas... Black River At Black Rock affecting Jackson, Lawrence and Independence Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ouachita River At Camden. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Low lying pastures and timber land along the river begins to flood. Sandy Beach Park at Camden starts to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Thursday the stage was 26.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 6 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Crest Time Date Ouachita River Camden 26.0 26.5 Thu 6 PM 26.0 25.5 25.0 **FALLING** &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
